Half priced burger Wednesday! From 11am-10pm, get 50% off a burger with the purchase of a beverage (excluding water). Dine in only!

11:00 AM - 10:00 PM

Join us for Happy Hour EVERYDAY from 4-7pm, get here early so you can get a seat! Happy Hour is valid in the bar and bar area, patio only.

04:00 PM - 07:00 PM

Happy Hour EVERYDAY from 4-7pm! 50% Off All Beer, Wine & House Liquor and discounts on select appetizers. Happy Hour prices only available at the bar or bar area and patio. *Excludes Signature Cocktails, Wine Bottles & Liquor over $14

1136 Hungryneck Blvd, Mt. Pleasant, SC 29464
map marker pin About us 
Located just minutes from the Isle of Palms, KSG Mount Pleasant is an upscale sports bar with a delicious menu that offers something for everyone.  We offer a family-friendly Kids Zone Play Area patio, so you can sit outside watch your games while the kiddos are entertained.

If you're visiting the Charleston area, we're close to many of the hotels off IOP Connector and offer ample parking. Food delivery available via UberEats. Follow us on Facebook, Instagram, Tiktok and more!
Read more about us 
Our Menus
Appetizers For All Create Your Own Chopped Salads King Sized Sandwiches House Made Burgers Scratch Made Entrees Sides & Subs Decadent Desserts Catering Menu Soft Drinks Cocktails Beer KIDS MENU Special Features Menu 
Specials
Check them out 
Reviews

review by - Yelp

Opal D:

They answered their phone and it was easy to place a pick-up order. The order was executed correctly, it was easy to get a bartenders' attention when I arrived, and the food was ready when they said it would be. Easy parking. The build-your-own salad is a great idea. My husband enjoyed his entree. We will get food from them again soon!

review by - Yelp

Makenzie L:

King Street Grill is always our go to for Sunday football! We're falcons fans and often don't get the game at home, so King Street is one of the only places we've found with enough TVs to satisfy everyone's football needs. We normally sit at the bar and the service is always top notch. The bartenders immediately greet you and continuously check on you to make sure you have everything you need...

review by - Yelp

Realty Pros K:

Wow! This bar and grill has AMAZING food and service! We came in last night for some wings and burgers. Talk about elevating bar and pub food- wowza! The wings were some of the best that we have ever had anywhere- perfectly crispy, tender and steaming hot...This little neighborhood joint gets our highest possible recommendation.

review by - Yelp

Madison K:

Me and my family enjoyed dinner at the Grille. The place was kept very clean and all workers were wearing masks and gloves when handling our food/dishes and drinks. The food itself was amazing! They had a range of options and even had great options for kids. I had the chicken Cesar side salad and wrap! Amazing!

review by - Yelp

Jennifer F:

The food was delicious. We sat outside, they had a covered area set up with a fan it was quite toasty but it didn't take away from the experience. They did have inside seats but we opted to eat outside. The waitress was professional and kind. She was wearing a mask. She checked on us quite a bit even though we sat outside.
